title: Vote on which charity wins 50% of the charity fund

replies.body: This is actually stupid. Depending on your honour level depends on how many votes count? It should just be one vote per person. The honour levels shouldn't be apart of this at all as it favours when it should just be a fair simple vote.

Is your honor level considered when you vote or by the deadline?

Eg. Someone votes and their honor level is different by deadline as it either goes up or down.
